commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity create
commands.summary: Create a new PowerBI embedded capacity.
commands.syntax:
az powerbi embedded-capacity create --name
                                    --resource-group
                                    --sku-name
                                    [--administration-members]
                                    [--location]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--sku-tier {PBIE_Azure}]
                                    [--tags]

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified PowerBI embedded capacity.
commands.syntax:
az powerbi embedded-capacity delete [--ids]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--yes]

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity list
commands.summary: List all the embedded capacities for the given resource group.

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity list-sku
commands.summary: List eligible SKUs for a PowerBI Dedicated resource.

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity show
commands.summary: Get details about the specified PowerBI embedded capacity.

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity update
commands.summary: Update the specified PowerBI embedded capacity.
commands.syntax:
az powerbi embedded-capacity update [--add]
                                    [--administration-members]
                                    [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--remove]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--set]
                                    [--sku-name]
                                    [--sku-tier {PBIE_Azure}]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--tags]

commands.name: az powerbi embedded-capacity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
